arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Real Madrid Preview: Start Time, Team News, How To Watch, Live Stream & Odds
arts.sum: New head coach Xabi Alonso has lost just one game in the 2025-26 season and won all three in the UCL. Last season, Liverpool won the encounter 2-0, dominating a poor Los Blancos team that was missing several players due to injury.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid confirm latest team news ahead of Liverpool Champions League clash
arts.sum: Los Blancos are almost at full strength ahead of Champions League showdown at Anfield

arts.ttl: Liverpool: Trent Alexander-Arnold confirms 'Agent Jude' theory as Real Madrid make Champions League decision
arts.sum: Alexander-Arnold returns to Liverpool for the first time since his summer move to Real Madrid

arts.ttl: “Would have certainly gone” – CEO explains why player is at Liverpool and not Real Madrid
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen CEO Fernando Carro claims Liverpool’s Florian Wirtz would have ended up at Real Madrid had they made a concrete attempt last summer. The Bundesliga side’s official was the guests on Sport1‘s Doppelpass and talked about the 22-year-old. He spent five years at Bayer Leverkusen and left them for Liverpool in June. Prior to The post “Would have certainly gone” – CEO explains why player is at Liverpool and not Real Madrid appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Will Trent Alexander-Arnold Play for Real Madrid vs. Liverpool?
arts.sum: The former Red hasn’t featured for Los Blancos since suffering an injury on Sept. 16.
